name: Final Frontier (Toloa)
description:
This is a game for 2 persons. It is played on one keyboard. Your goal is to kill the other player while you stay alive. Gather items to enhance your chance of success.

I made this game in roughly 2-3 months. I did everything except for the audio which I got from Freesound.org (see credits in the game).

Known Bugs:

You have to Play the game on the "fantastic" graphics option or the speed at which it runs will mess everything up.

If you have an old keyboard, the input from both players might not work.

The Web version is untested and might mess with the User Interface.
